diff2html-report.configuration.title: Diff2html Report Configuration
diff2html-report.configuration.filter: Filter string to include only specific files in the diff report.
diff2html-report.configuration.encoding: The character set encoding used when retrieving a specific version of repository files (e.g. in the Diff View). A list of all supported encodings can be found [here](https://github.com/ashtuchkin/iconv-lite/wiki/Supported-Encodings).
diff2html-report.configuration.maxGitDif: Maximum file size (in bytes) for the git diff output. The default value is 64MB.
diff2html-report.configuration.drawLineC: Display line count statistics in the diff report.
diff2html-report.configuration.defaultVi: Default view type for diff reports.
diff2html-report.configuration.useOnline: Use online resources (CDN) for diff reports instead of local files.
diff2html-report.commitOption.label.inpu: Manually enter a branch name, tag name, or commit hash:
diff2html-report.commitOption.detail.inp: ðŸ‘‰Manually enter branch name, tag name, or commit hash:
diff2html-report.commitOption.placeHolde: Select a branch or tag as the base
Select a branch or tag as the current version
diff2html-report.commandOption.placeHold: Select git diff options (multiple selections allowed)
diff2html-report.commandNoDiffText: No differences found for the selected commits.
diff2html-report.webview.title: Git Diff Preview
